revision.comment: [[WP:DABPRIMARY|moved the primary topic to the top]]
revision.text:
'''[[Alexander of Greece]]''' (1893–1920) was king of Greece from 1917 until his death.
'''Alexander of Greece''' may also refer to: * [[Alexander of Greece (rhetorician)]] ({{floruit|2nd century|pfx-lk=abbr}}) * [[Alexander the Great]] (356–323 BC), ancient Greek king and general
==See also== * [[Alexander#People with the given name Alexander|Alexander § People with the given name Alexander]]
{{Human name disambiguation|Alexander of Greece}}
